All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ColorCoding
The class ColorCoding manages the colors.
Connectivity
The class Connectivity manages the transfer of data from skeleton to other classes where the map objects are used.
Continent
The class Continent defines Continents and it's properties such as ID, Name, Control Value and list of countries it has.
Country
The class Country defines Countries and it's properties such as ID, Name, Continent ID and list of neighbours.
GameEngine
The class GameEngine have the main function, so it starts the game by giving options to players to choose different commands.
Map
The class Map defines Maps and it's properties such as File Name and checker if the file exists or not.
MapCheck
The class MapCheck performs validation of map.
MapCreater
The class MapCreator will write in the file whenever user creates a map.
MapEditor
The class MapEditor will make changes to the existing map according to the user.
MapLoader
The class MapLoader will load the map selected by the user.
Order
The class Order defines Orders and it's properties such as from country, to country and transfer of number of armies.
Player
The class Player defines Players and it's properties such as Name, ID, countries owned by players and orders given by player.
PlayersGameplay
The class PlayerGameplay manages the player perspective.
SaveMap
The class SaveMap saves the map once user creates a new map or make changes to the existing ones.
TestHelloWorld
 
ViewMap
The class ViewMap displays the map in an organised manner.
